column4: Hi all, I'm wondering why ps ux | grep `word` shows the grep `word` process: http://arenlor.pastebin.com/d1102d900
because when you ran grep, it became a process that is listed with ps, so it grep'd itself
you can try...  ps ux > file.txt && grep word file.txt  ...not sure how that would work with whatever you're scripting
I'm just going to write a bash script and add it to cron so that may work
